description: Try our easy to follow Tuscan Beef Steaks With Char-Grilled Vegetables recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steak,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Zucchini,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Sweet potato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Tuscan Beef Steaks With CharGrilled Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs fresh parsley leaves, finely chopped
2 medium zucchini, sliced lengthways on the diagonal
2 tbs fresh rosemary leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Season the steaks with olive oil, rosemary and salt and pepper.
Preheat a chargrill pan over high heat and cook the vegetables for 3 to 5 minutes on each side or until tender and charred. Set aside and cover to keep warm.
Cook steaks for 2 to 3 minutes each side or until cooked to your liking. Remove steaks from heat and cover loosely with foil. Toss the vegetables with the balsamic vinegar and season.
Slice steaks against the grain. Place on top of the vegetables to serve.
